Remove Disease (C3 Conj): Cures touched of all diseases

Resist Energy (C2 Abju): Touched gains resistance 20 to chosen energy for 100 min
Restoration (C4 Conj): Dispels magical ability harm from touched and heals all temporary ability damage, restores 1 drained ability, removes fatigue or exhaustion and temporary negative levels, and restores 1 drained level

Spell Resistance (Protection5 Abju): Touched gains SR 22 for 10 min

Stone Shape (Earth3 Tran): Self reshapes 20' cu of stone
Wall Of Stone (Earth5 Conj): R200' Creates 10 5' x 2 inch thick permanent stone wall
Magic Notes:
Wisdom Cleric Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level C1, C2
Aura: Visible to Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law based on deity alignment
Protective Touch: Touched gains +10 on next save w/in 1 hour 1/dy
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Spontaneous Cleric Spell: May cast Cure or Inflict in place of known spell
Still Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out movement
